snippet: The data, recorded for the first time in at least a century, showed further evidence that white Americans will become a minority within three decades.
abstract: Census data shows that deaths exceeded births among non-Hispanic white Americans for the first time in at least a century, benchmark that heralds profound demographic change.
lead_paragraph: The data, recorded for the first time in at least a century, showed further evidence that white Americans will become a minority within three decades.

headline.main: Census Benchmark for White Americans: More Deaths Than Births
headline.print_headline: For Whites, More Deaths Than Births, Data Shows
